text: Chy ne bachyv ty lytsemiriv, yaki kazhutʹ svoyim neviruyuchym bratam sered lyudey Pysannya: «Yakshcho vyzhenutʹ vas, to my neodminno pidemo razom iz vamy, i my ne pidkorymosya nakazu voyuvaty proty vas. A yakshcho khtosʹ bude borotysya proty vas, to my dopomozhemo vam». Ta Allah svidchytʹ, shcho vony breshutʹ
